data.title: Website Deployment
data.description: ‘Bridge the Gap’, ‘Span the Pass’… ‘Zip Line the Ravine’?

tab.title: Overview
markdown: Anyone with website experience knows the urgency of finding the right team, the relief of signing off on the project, and then the renewed urgency of getting the site developed and deployed without significant delays or added costs. The following are the steps in website deployment, usually underplayed in project launch, usually urgent in site launch:

A specialty foods seller found that the project plan for its China site had significant gaps between development and deployment, with resultant delays that were impacting tangential marketing and sales efforts.
